mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(EMPLYR_SN), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'000000')+1) AS EMPLYR_SN FROM TCM_EMPLYR WHERE EMPLYR_SN LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') ||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCM_EMPLYR ( EMPLYR_SN, EMPLYR_NM, EMPLYR_ID, EMPLYR_PASSWORD, SEXDSTN_CODE, EMAIL_ADRES, EMPLYR_MBTLNUM, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT )VALUES( #{emplyrSn}, #{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phoneNo}, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE )
